      • sortByCreationDate

        public java.util.ArrayList<Comment> sortByCreationDate(java.util.ArrayList<Comment> comments)
        Sorts a given list of comments by creation date. If an empty list is provided as the list to be sorted, an empty list is returned.
        Parameters:
        comments - The list of comments to be sorted
        Returns:
        The list of comments sorted by creation date

      • sortPicturesFirst

        public java.util.ArrayList<Comment> sortPicturesFirst(java.util.ArrayList<Comment> comments)
        Sorts a given list of comments by pictures first. If an empty list is provided as the list to be sorted, an empty list is returned.
        Parameters:
        comments - The list of comments to be sorted.
        Returns:
        The list of comments sorted by pictures first.

      • sortByLocation

        public java.util.ArrayList<Comment> sortByLocation(java.util.ArrayList<Comment> comments,
                                          GeoLocation location)
        Sorts a given list of comments by a specified location. If an empty list is provided as the list to be sorted, an empty list is returned.
        Parameters:
        comments - The list of comments to be sorted
        location - The location to sort in proximity to
        Returns:
        The list of comments sorted by provided location

      • getSingle

        public Comment getSingle()
        Returns the first comment in the CommentController

        For use when the CommentController is known to only have one comment object in it

        Returns:
        A single Comment object
